file_content.text: My lord, what is this? You've given the cult over to the Veil? This was not what I had in mind.
If you had been more competent, I might have let you keep the cult.
You failed me.
Competent? You have the audacity to judge my competence? Who do you think runs this cult?
You have gotten too proud since becoming a Lord of the Sith. It's time you were taught some respect.
I am not the apprentice I was. I am a Lord of the Sith, and I need powerful allies.
It was time for a change.
Lest you forget, I am a Lord of the Sith too, and was long before you were. I will not stand for this!
Don't question me. [Kill him.]
I've recovered the CN-12. Thank you for your help.
Excellent news. I am glad if I was able to repay, even in the slightest, the immense debt I owe you.
Stay as long as you like. The cultists cannot have enough of your presence, and neither can I.
My lord! You've returned to us. My lord!
The Great Healer. Who shakes the earth with a thought!
The Great Dragon. Who shakes the earth with a thought.
Is it true you killed Darth Zash?
And that you can bind ghosts and steal their power?
My lord, take this. It's not much, but we want you to have it.
I don't need your donations. I need a CN-12 chip.
Keep it.
Yes, my lord. Of course.
I believe I placed someone in charge of this cult while I'm gone. Where would he be?
Where is Paladius?
I told him you'd returned. He's coming to see you right now.
Come by later and perhaps I will demonstrate my power more fully.
Thank you very much.
Oh thank you, my lord. Thank you!
My lord. How delightful to see you again.
I am sorry to hear of your struggles with Darth Thanaton. But there can be no doubt--you are the future of the Sith.
I have kept our, I mean, your cult well-maintained in your absence.
I need a CN-12 sensor chip to help complete a special project for a Moff.
I'm calling in my debts.
So what's this about my cult and the CN-12 sensor chip? I need one for a special project.
I understand you've been busy.
I would expect nothing less. Now I'm interested in the CN-12 chip.
Good to hear it.
It is a worthy master who expects the most of his servants.
The CN-12? Why that was just some speculation, a side project of ours. But I am delighted if you would find it useful.
Unfortunately, a new ganglord, the Veil, is giving us a bit of trouble. Our last CN-12 shipment was stolen, and our supply chain is dead.
Where does the Veil make his hideout?
Then I'll talk to him.
The Veil will answer to me.
I'll deal with it.
I hope so. The more the Veil interferes, the more costly this endeavor becomes.
Why haven't you done anything about it?
Stop him.
Well, my lord, that's easier said than done.
The Veil stays well out of view in Shadow Town.
When I tried to negotiate, he said he would only talk to you, but I didn't think that would be possible.
Perhaps I can persuade this Veil character to see things my way.
Then I'll meet with him.
Few can withstand your charms.
You should have told me about this when it happened.
Next time, call, don't think.
I had hoped to resolve the problem without troubling you. My apologies.
When will people learn? If I'm involved, they've already lost.
Then he's a fool.
People are stubborn, my lord. As I was.
Best wishes, and good luck.
